About

Hi, nice to see you here. I am Kewin Rémy, a swiss software engineer with 4 years experience, a lovely wife, an incredible son and a job that I love ! Yes, I am really lucky. I also speak 4 languages and starts to understand Züri Dütsch. Indeed, I come from Porrentruy, a beautiful town in the canton of Jura but also lived in Lausanne, Hong Kong and Buenos Aires. Before discovering my real passion ‘technology’, I studied political science and economics at the university. Feel free to contact me, I am very curious to learn about your story.

Professional Experience

SIX Payment Services

Software Engineer | June 2019 - Until Now

Six Payment Services / Worldine is the leading payment service provider in Europe. I work for the payment gateway Saferpay.

  • Integration of Apple Pay as a payment mean.
  • Development of the hosted fields for pci improvements.
  • Development of some parts of the second 3DS standard.
Fintech Payment .NET .NET Core JavaScript React Security OWASP Top 10 Hacking

ELCA Informatics

Software Engineer | September 2016 - May 2019

Elca is a recognized swiss IT consulting company. I worked in the CRM team and the Viacar team.

  • Leading a team of 8 developers for a very large DWH project.
  • Development of small parts (frontend & backend) of a very complex web application for road offices.
  • Installed, configured and customized CRM applications for 3 clients (private banking, oil & gaz & pharma).
DWH WPF .NET Dynamics 365 JavaScript Devops
